Summary: One orange ball, then 3 starlike, pulsating objects fly, hover, fly across sky
trends: There have been 112 other sightings in Orlando
There were no other sightings in Orlando on or around August 18th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsApprox. at 5:00 AM, ET, I saw, from my front-yard, 3 star-like objects in the dark sky move across the sky, from north toward east, with pulsating amber lights (more orange than red). They moved in a fairly straight path following one another with a distance in between. With my arm stretched, they were at a height of an index finger length above the roof-top of the neighbor's house (a few feet) across my street. The objects were silent, moved along very slowly, flying toward the east. After as few minutes of observing, I saw them moving much closer together, now looking like they formed a triangle for a few seconds, while hovering on the same spot. Then they continued on toward the east. Then I heard a helicopter noise, but didn't see one. Earlier, approx. 4:50 AM, I also saw an orange ball in the sky from my back-yard, moving along silently, from north to east. I only saw it for a few seconds, after which it disappeared behind the buildings in the distance. This orange object was the same I have seen and reported on July 16, 2011, except it had no smaller lights below it. This time it was moving along fairly quickly.
